org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def
Class AeMessageMatcher

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def.AeMessageMatcher
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeOperationSignatureMatcher
public class AeMessageMatcher
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a routine for matching a Document[] against wsdl messages to see if the message parts match the array. This is used when matching the operation being invoked when receiving a Document style message since that style omits the operation from the SOAP message.

Field Summary

          array of documents for our operation's input message
